column5: Mir in the second round, but hopefully I'm wrong  Can't lose that way, lol. But seriously, I'd rather see Nog win  all I can say is wow! who would have ever thought it would end like that? lol
as long as Machida can beat Jones, I'll be happy.
Lol big nog is a joke. Thought he had him, mir looked like crap
Up until that sub haha, did he break his arm?
I dont think he will be writing any checks tonight... broken arm.  G
wow did you see that arm break
OUCH!
was that an arm break? Looked to me like the shoulder joint went? Either way, damn, ouch!
Surpised mir outrolled him on the ground. Nog shouldn't of went for a sub of his own
That was crazy! We may not see Nog anymore after that. Don't think anyone expected that!
Ya he dislocated his shoulder, after seeing the slowmo it was clearer
wow standing choke.... great fight!
Jones is the real deal after that. Great fight indeed!
Too bad, machida was outstriking him. It wasn't until he got caught with the elbow, seemed like he lost confidence or something, wasn't moving around much
I dont know why it took Jones that long to go to the ground after losing in the striking. What a great win for Mir! Very unfortunate for Hominick. He will be back.
Jones is the man

Still not big fan of JBJ. He really needs to move up a weight class imo, not because he's clearing out the div, because he's not really lhw imo. He's a scrawny hw  Wish the Hominick/ Zombie fight had gone MUCH longer, woulda been epic I think.
LOL at picturing jon jones vs brock or overeem hahahah
Lol @ anyone doubting Jon Jones now
give him a steady steak and taters diet and 20-30lbs and he would be at home as a hw and tool bork.
Jones is talented, just hate how fake and classless he is. Theirs a vid somewhere on the internet that his own trainer tells him to check on Machida, get some fans..
Anyone have working links for tonight's PPV? Been awhile since I haven't had the time to watch the PPV's... so I figured karma can pay me back finally lol  G
Deleted: beat you to it
Payed this time bud. I got a virus the last two times. New PC, aint taking the chance. Great card,and the free is awesome. .
Is that all you could come up with Terry?  :-)
NO THANKS BUD.   I will pay,when the cards are worth it.
Machida, mir, lil nog, hominick, ebersole. Who you guys calling?
Deleted: beat you to it
Jones. both nogs,hom an ebe.
I really hope Mir gets his a$$ handed to him tonight. Would love to say Machida. Jones reach just might be too much. I'll second danbob with the rest.
http://www.firstrowsports.tv/sport/boxing-wwe-ufc.html    This one has worked for me the last few times. Not sure about tonight as it hasn't started but looks like it will.
I still think mir will be too much for big nog, as much as I hate mir. Jones reach will be a prob, I hope machida ko's him though

As much as Mir beat on him the last fight, Nog looked awesome against Schaub in Rio. I think we'll see a much diffferent fight this time around. Jeez, Mir weighed in at 260! Dont know what he weighed the last time around, but I don't see him being very fast lugging that sort of weight around.
I read that the MAN is coming back soon.
Not TANK,but he was one hell of a guy that could giver and take.  Im talking
War Hominick!!!
i think it took longer for you to type that than for the fight to finish
wow, you're not kidding!
well that's 7 seconds I will never get back
Tough loss, came in with a looping hook, left himself undefended, good call cause he was out
http://www.vipbox.tv/sports/boxing-wwe-ufc.html  good quality feeds once you close the two pop ups
7 seconds ?? wow. this is the same guy who fought to the end in spite of a nasty hematoma, courtesy aldo so I would never have predicted this.  I feel bad for hominick.
Yup especially with his trainer passing away not too long ago.
Thank you! Tito.. got his butt handed to him! looks good on him... afterall... he has Jenna Jamison to "lick" his wounds.  G.
